title: What race are Slavic people? - Quora

response.answer_text: Slavs are very different. Being Slavic is a cultural thing. Eastern baltids: Russians, Ukrainians, Belarusians. alpine and nordid: Czech, Slovak. dinardic ( pre indo Europeans) : south Slavs aka Serbs, Croats, Bosnians, Macedonians and Montenegrins. Mediterranean: Bulgaria. be in mind there are many racial haplo groups in these nations I’m just stating the majority.

slavic people are very mix, Well their are simply a slavic race who descends from illyrians, thracians, dacians, sarmatians, balts, some even celts and germanics, etcetera. scythians, turks you get the point

Slavic people are white Caucasians. They are not middle eastern, nor black, nor east asian, nor turkic, nor austronesian. In fact they many of them stayed in the original Proto Indo European homeland which is Eastern Europe.
